name: Analyze Video
description: Analyze video content by extracting representative frames and analyzing them using Claude's vision capabilities. Provides a comprehensive summary of video content, scenes, objects, actions, and any visible text.

video_source.description: Video source - can be a URL or file path to video file

num_frames.description: Number of frames to extract and analyze (evenly distributed throughout video)

analysis_focus.description: Optional: Specific aspect to focus on (e.g., 'actions', 'objects', 'text', 'people', 'scenes')

include_timestamps.description: Whether to include approximate timestamps for each analyzed frame

examples.expected_result: Returns comprehensive summary of video content across 10 frames
Returns timeline of detected actions with timestamps

examples.scenario: Identify objects in product demo video
examples.expected_result: Returns list of objects visible throughout the video
